comment._content: Saw a similar scene last year, at the job centre on Westgate Road, Newcastle upon Tyne. Some things dont change.

comment._content: Notice the stern-looking gentleman wearing the bowler hat - not part of the queue I would guess, maybe there to control number of people entering the building at any one time?

comment._content: They don't wear bowler hats and flat caps in the dole queue anymore. It's all baseball caps and tracksuits ;-)
